Module CAMs
Package controllers

Class StaffController

java.lang.Object
controllers.UserController
controllers.StaffController
public class StaffController extends UserController
The StaffController class handles user interactions for the Staff. It is responsible for application level tasks. It utilizes services ICampStaffService and SuggestionRequestService,EnquiryRequestService to perform lower level tasks for camp and requests respectively. It extends UserController.

    Edits a camp based on ID, that is owned by the current user stored in AuthStore.
    private static void
    generateReport()
    Generates a CSV file containing the info of the camps that the user stored in AuthStore is staff of, with optional filters.
    private static void
    performanceCCM()
    Prints the list of CCMs associated with the camps that the user stored in AuthStore is staff of, along with their points.

    Prints out the list of camps that are owned by the current user stored in AuthStore.

    Provides functionality to list or reply to enquires by students on the camp the user stored in AuthStore is staff of.
    private static void
    viewReplySuggestions()
    Provides functionality to list or reply to suggestions by CCMs on the camp the user stored in AuthStore is staff of.
